ygData.subject: Re: po ssible weekly trade f estival...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The worm turned on the past weekend.  Fed up of cowering from the ever swarming Sand Giants, most of Oasis (about 25ppl) formed an agry mob by the pier.  A
ygData.messageBody:
>One last thing - why do people in the Oasis insist on training sand
>giants into other people before they die? Can't they have the good
>grace to just die AWAY from the medditating mages? Just something that
>bugs me : )

The worm turned on the past weekend. Fed up of cowering from the ever
swarming Sand Giants, most of Oasis (about 25ppl) formed an agry mob by the
pier. A quick bit of organisation saw casters and healers grouped, and the
nearest Giant was swiftly pulled to his death. Not bad for a bunch of
lv15 - 20s, with a lv30 or so tank. Made for some truly excellent
screenshots, the poor thing didnt know who he was meant to be hitting as he
swung from casters to healers to bashers and back.

The following day, they had their revenge though. Some fool trained an SG
onto Pillar1. Total carnage, i and many others died staring at their spell
books. I believe he then went on to whack a few of the gawping crowd on the
beach too, which serves em right for staring at the accident. :)

When i got back, there were a LOT of naked people running around. :)

Aunoa.
Cleric of the 16th.
